CHAT.comment: dear Wendy , How are you? When are you coming? Happy Thanksgiying. love [= y made into a v] Chi.

Chi suggests who to write to; Mot and Chi collaborate on what to say , but Mot practically spells every word for Chi as well as punctuates it; Mot occasionally takes the pen and makes corrections herself; although she is spelling out every word Mot does remind Chi of what the letter says and whether a word (you) is the same as a previous word

u.a: tells to go to her room
starts to move Chi's hand , then points
points to previous you in the letter .
SIS2 asks when dinner is ready in the background
the v in the word love but it looks like a y
hesitantly but more fluently than Very Hungry Caterpillar
